snippet: Mr. Savides, one of America’s most respected cinematographers, helped directors like Woody Allen and Gus Van Sant achieve the visual expressivity they sought.
abstract: Harris Savides, one of America's most respected cinematographers, dies at age 55.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Savides, one of America’s most respected cinematographers, helped directors like Woody Allen and Gus Van Sant achieve the visual expressivity they sought.

headline.seo: Harris Savides, Visual Poet, Dies at 55
headline.main: Harris Savides, Visual Poet, Dies at 55
